sentences.en: A part of the path to Bodhisattva requires discernment in one's guidance.
sentences.cn: 前往菩萨级别路径的一部分,就是需要甄别你的引导者.

sentences.en: A rebuke a man of discernment a hundred lashes a fool.
sentences.cn: 一句责备话、深入聪明人的心、强如责打愚昧人一百下.

sentences.en: For her Minerva aided and endowed with courage and discernment.
sentences.cn: 因为密涅瓦帮助她,给了她勇气和洞察力.

sentences.en: He had a lively discernment of injustice toward other men and toward himself.
sentences.cn: 他很敏感,别人和自己只要待遇上有一点不公,他都看在眼里.

sentences.en: He showed discernment in judging my general ability.
sentences.cn: 在判断我的综合运用能力上,他显示出非凡的眼力.

sentences.en: He showed great discernment in his choice of wine.
He shows great discernment in his choice of friends.
It establishes relationships and analogies utilizing discernment and intuitive analysis.
sentences.cn: 它利用洞察和直觉分析建立起关联和类比.

sentences.en: Our discernment of aid is not the belief but the necessity.
sentences.cn: 我们对要帮助的人的选择不是在信仰,而是在他是否需要帮助.

sentences.en: Sadat had an uncanny psychological discernment.
sentences.cn: 萨达特有惊人的能力,能看透别人的心理.

sentences.en: Sex addicts have poor discernment skills for choosing boyfriends.
sentences.cn: 同时,性上瘾患者甄别合适男友的能力也差强人意.

sentences.en: Silence leveling effect on your perspective, sharpening your powers of discernment.
sentences.cn: 沉默可以使你的看法更加全面, 使你的洞察力更加敏锐.

sentences.en: Something that serves to obscure clear perception and discernment.
sentences.cn: 使清楚的感知和了解变得模糊的事物.

sentences.en: The virginity associated with Virgo actually relates to discernment, to the choice.
sentences.cn: 由处女去联想处女座的特质,也可以发现一些,如警惕、审慎 、 沈静以及羞涩.
这女人的品位和鉴赏力

sentences.en: William was a man of discernment, with an eye for quality.
sentences.cn: 威廉是个有鉴赏力的人，对于品质的优劣很有眼光。

words.tran_cn: 有辨识能力的；眼光敏锐的

trans.tran_cn: <褒>识别能力，洞察力，敏锐，精明
trans.tran_en: the ability to make good judgments about people or about art, music, style etc
